commands: echo 'Granting database access to classicadmin user...'
mysql -h dev-classic-app-db.cfqe002kq5rb.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -u classicadmin -pspH4nfnPyFiAlnRTyj3EMtDciABKP0p2 -e 'GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON classicappdb.* TO CURRENT_USER();'
mysql -h dev-classic-app-db.cfqe002kq5rb.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -u classicadmin -pspH4nfnPyFiAlnRTyj3EMtDciABKP0p2 classicappdb -e 'SELECT "Database access granted successfully!" AS Status;'
